titles.title: MEGA Act of 2025
Make Entertainment Great Again Act of 2025
MEGA Act of 2025
To designate the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts as the "Donald J. Trump Center for the Performing Arts".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
